attributes.action: Stop phone companies charging us for free and normal rate 08 numbers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Does anyone out there find it disgusting to be charged 20p+ per min, on top of your inclusive minutes for numbers that cost 5p per min or are free from normal land lines?
If so sign this petition against this greed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
